jobs.title: Full-Stack & Cloud Developer Intern
jobs.description: Real-time medical emergency tracking and dispatch system with an interactive and intuitive interface, integrating SignalR, Azure Maps, and deployed on Azure Cloud.
responsibilities: Developed the backend in .NET Core using SignalR for real-time tracking and notifications
Built an interactive and intuitive frontend using Next.js and TypeScript
Integrated Azure Maps API on both backend and frontend
Deployed the application on Azure Cloud via Azure DevOps

jobs.title: Graphic designer (client)
jobs.description: Developed a web application based on a predefined design ensuring seamless implementation and functionality.
responsibilities: Developing a web application based on a predefined design

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer Intern
jobs.description: Automate the integration process of interns within the company, streamline the creation of PDF documents for interns, and monitor and track the progress of interns effectively.
responsibilities: Automate the integration process of interns within the company
Streamline the creation of PDF documents for interns
